page.title: 12Another home in St.Helens
page.content: I don't live in a house, I live in a pub;so I have a different life to other people. The pub is white and brown with a picture of King Alfred on one side, because it is on a corner.The name of our pub is the Royal Alfred.The pub is about 100 years old because the people who had it bfore us had it for over 60 years. Inside it has been redecorated so it looks a bit old fashioned.It has a pool table in the bar,also a bandit and a cigarette machine.Upstairs we used to have a snooker table in one of the rooms,but we sold it. Further along the landing is my bedroom, my mum and dad's bedroom and my brother's bedroom.Then the last room is the livingroom and kitchen.In the kitchen we had a wall knocked out so it would be bigger.
